page.title: 16 A FARMERS'S WIFE'S DAY
page.content: { Mrs. Cuthbert's Duties {1}Helping at lambing,{2}Feeding lambs and hens,{3}Driving tractor,{4}Moving stock. {A Typical Day {6.15am:}Rise,feed lambs and hens,clean out fireplace,light fire.Family breakfast.{8.30am:}Girls to school on bus.Make beds,wash dishes,son to nursery,shopping.{10.00am:}Washing. Feed lambs,tidy house.Collect eggs,prepare lunch.{12.15pm:}Collect son.Lunch,wash up,housework,baking, ironing.Feed lambs and hens.{3.50pm:} Girls arrive home.{4.00pm:}Tea for four,homework_spellings.Gardening, prepare evening meal.{7.00pm:}Supper for children,bath and bed.Feed lambs.{ {8.30 - 9.30pm:}Supper for adults.{ {10.00pm:}Fall into bed exhausted!
